steps.name: Maya
steps.text: You receive a strange message from someone you don't know.

steps.name: Maya
steps.text: You ignore the message. The person continues to message you more aggressively.

steps.name: Maya
steps.text: You respond, but they ask for personal information. What do you do?

steps.name: Maya
steps.text: You blocked the person. Good job! Always protect your boundaries.

steps.name: Maya
steps.text: You reported the incident. Your teacher helped resolve the situation.

steps.name: Maya
steps.text: Sharing personal info led to your account being compromised.
